skillTree.localised_description: Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.

skillTree.localised_description: As one of the swiftest of airborne vessels, the Skycutter allows an Asur fleet to maintain aerial superiority over the battlefield.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.

enabled_if: Unit 's current Speed is higher than 50% of its base Speed.

skillTree.localised_description: Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: An Elf's mind is prone to obsession. This meditative discipline centers the spirit, shielding it from magical chaos and temptation.
A human wizard may take a lifetime to master just one aspect of the Winds. A High Elf masters all eight just to be considered a student of Hoeth.
Lesser races use magic as a blunt tool; the Asur wield it as an art. This is the discipline of Saphery, achieving more with less.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: Once swathed in the mists, the warriors become swift, adaptable, and unseen until the moment they strike.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: Shifting and manipulating natural eddies of fog to obscure their movements, the Mist Mage gains an edge through unseen machinations.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: The ensorceled vapours gather with each incantation, gradually weaving an impenetrable shroud upon the white-garbed host.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases when nearby allies cast spells.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: Braiding the ethereal sea mists is a fickle and wayward endeavour, but it brings protection from the mercurial Lord of the Depths.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
The Sea God's wrath fills your lungs with phantom brine, a taste of the fate that nearly claimed his Herald, Aislinn.

skillTree.localised_description: Clouds of droplets manifest to continuously form and evaporate around a chosen locale, dampening the path of incoming missiles.
A veil of vapour manifests around an ally, invigorating the beleaguered with glimpses of long-fallen kin. A portent of a mighty victory, tinged with the aftertaste of sadness.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire â€“ it's explosive to say the least!
Not every cloud has a silver lining.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Whatever quality is needed to stand guard over the Asur way of life, this one has it in abundance.
Looking "not too well" has become a permanent condition. Clearly, they're lacking essential herbs.
They say two are better than one. They are, of course, totally wrong in every respect.
Chance is like magic â€“ it can be harnessed to the individual's will.
Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action â€“ wherever, whenever.
Impressively energetic for a thousand years old â€“ even by their own reckoning.
Through their veins a charge is racing. Energy, filling the ominous void within.
"Staying this supple takes effort. You donâ€™t get definition like that by sitting about and drinking."
"If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."
Machinery â€“ and indeed progress of any kind â€“ is anathema to this one, because there's no substitute for good, honest toil.
This one can never leave something alone. They always have to meddle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: +10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Much of the Ulthuan skyline built over the last thousand years is down to this oneâ€™s sterling endeavours.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Too late, too late!" will be the cry, when the one with the bargains passes you by.
Fortunately, there are some who really apply themselves to the problems of the world. Just as well, otherwise we'd beâ€¦ Oh wait...
If it requires accuracy and organisation, this one is your Elf. Not so much fun at parties, however.

effects.description:

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "There's always a way â€“ always an angle. You just have to find it."
An individual of exceptional skill and worth; the very embodiment of sagacity.
